mapper.select: SELECT SUBJECT.COLLEGE_ID AS collegeId , COLLEGE.COLLEGE_NAME AS collegeName , SUBSTR(SUBJECT.SEMESTER, 5, 1) AS semester , SUBJECT.SUBJECT_NAME AS subjectName , SUBJECT.GRADE_TYPE AS gradeType , CASE SUBJECT.GRADE_TYPE WHEN 1 THEN '절대평가' ELSE '상대평가' END AS gradeTypeNAME , SUBJECT.ATTENDANCE_SCORE_RATIO AS attendanceScoreRatio , SUBSTR(SUBJECT.SEMESTER, 1, 4) AS year FROM TBL_SUBJECT SUBJECT, TBL_COLLEGE COLLEGE WHERE SUBJECT.COLLEGE_ID = COLLEGE.COLLEGE_ID

SELECT SUBJECT.COLLEGE_ID AS collegeId , COLLEGE.COLLEGE_NAME AS collegeName , SUBSTR(SUBJECT.SEMESTER, 5, 1) AS semester , SUBJECT.SUBJECT_NAME AS subjectName , SUBJECT.GRADE_TYPE AS gradeType , CASE SUBJECT.GRADE_TYPE WHEN 1 THEN '절대평가' ELSE '상대평가' END AS gradeTypeNAME , SUBJECT.ATTENDANCE_SCORE_RATIO AS attendanceScoreRatio , SUBSTR(SUBJECT.SEMESTER, 1, 4) AS year FROM TBL_SUBJECT SUBJECT, TBL_COLLEGE COLLEGE WHERE SUBJECT.COLLEGE_ID = COLLEGE.COLLEGE_ID AND SUBJECT.COLLEGE_ID = #{collegeId} AND SUBJECT.SEMESTER = #{semester} AND REPLACE(SUBJECT.SUBJECT_NAME, ' ', '') = REPLACE(#{subjectName}, ' ', '')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_SUBJECT WHERE COLLEGE_ID = #{collegeId} AND SEMESTER = #{semester} AND REPLACE(SUBJECT_NAME, ' ', '') = REPLACE(#{subjectName}, ' ', '')
